name: Clipto
description: Clipto is an AI-powered platform for transcription, video editing, and digital asset management, designed to streamline content creation.
longDescription: Clipto is an AI-driven media management assistant that provides tools for transcription, video editing, and digital asset management, emphasizing privacy and efficiency. It supports content creators, businesses, and researchers by offering accurate transcription in over 99 languages, seamless integration with tools like Adobe Premiere, and on-device AI processing to ensure data security. The platform allows users to upload audio or video files or link content from platforms like YouTube for quick transcription and editing. Clipto's mission is to simplify workflows, save time, and enhance productivity for professionals managing media content. Its user-friendly interface and customizable options make it accessible for diverse use cases, from YouTubers creating subtitles to businesses transcribing Zoom meetings.
features: AI-powered transcription delivers 99% accurate text conversion for audio and video in over 99 languages, streamlining content creation.
On-device AI processing ensures user data remains private and secure, only leaving the device with explicit permission.
Smart asset search enables quick retrieval of media files, enhancing workflow efficiency for content managers.
Light video editing tools allow users to cut and refine videos directly within the platform, saving time.
YouTube downloader feature lets users transcribe and edit content directly from YouTube URLs, simplifying the process.
Speaker identification automatically tags speakers in transcriptions, making it easier to organize multi-speaker content.
Export options support multiple formats like SRT, VTT, TXT, and DOCX, offering flexibility for different platforms.
Seamless integration with Adobe Premiere and other tools enhances compatibility with professional editing workflows.
Unlimited uploads allow users to process large volumes of media without restrictions, ideal for high-volume creators.
7-day free trial provides full access to premium features, enabling users to test the platform before committing.

faqs.question: What types of files can I transcribe with Clipto?
faqs.answer: Clipto supports audio and video files, as well as URLs from platforms like YouTube and Facebook, for transcription in over 99 languages.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Clipto?
faqs.answer: Yes, Clipto runs AI algorithms on-device, ensuring your data remains private and only leaves your computer if you explicitly choose to share it.

faqs.question: Does Clipto offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Clipto provides a 7-day free trial with premium access to all features, but a subscription is required for continued use after the trial.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Clipto subscription easily?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime via the cancellation page on the website, with no charges if canceled during the free trial.

faqs.question: How accurate is Clipto's transcription service?
faqs.answer: Clipto offers 99% transcription accuracy for audio and video files, with features like speaker identification and timestamp generation.

faqs.question: Does Clipto integrate with other editing software?
faqs.answer: Yes, Clipto integrates seamlessly with tools like Adobe Premiere, enhancing professional video editing workflows.

faqs.question: Can I use Clipto offline?
faqs.answer: Clipto supports offline functionality for most features, with syncing available once an internet connection is restored.
